puzzle.title: Maps
puzzle.hint:
Here is a list of words that you need to find:
- ALONE - ASHORE - BELT - CANAL - CANNON - CANOE - CAPTAIN - CHEST - CLIMB - CROOK - CURSE - GRASP - HORN - IRON - JOHNNYDEPP - LAMP - LAST - NEED - ONCE - OPENSEAS - PARROT - PEGLEG - PIRATE - PLANK - PLOT - PLUNDER - PROP - RACE - RAGE - REDBEARD - ROPE - SAGA - SALT - SCURVY - STEAL - TALE - TIKI - TIRE - TREASURE - VOYAGE
Focus on the (few) unused letters in the word search.
Does the size of the wordsearch match the size of the maps?
Focus on the first letter of each line of the poem.
